content: > when i got my hands on the new caron simply soft tweeds yarn i knew exactly what i wanted to crochet… an owl you may remember the tweeds yarn is also perfect for my crochet owl hats pattern as well and with graduation right around the corner i thought a wise old owl with a graduation cap would be the perfect little gift for the grads in your life my middle child is graduating from kindergarten and i am just so darn proud of the progress he has made this year so this owl is for him finished size approx 7 inches tall by 4 inches wide materials caron simply soft tweeds in taupe and off white caron simply soft in gold and black size h crochet hook polyfil fiber stuffing 12mm black safety eyes tapestry needle
